Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 2; B1: 1; S0: 8; S1: 5; S2: 3; S3: 3; S4: 3; S5: 3; S6: 2; S7: 2; S8: 1; S9: 1 Attack: B: 10; S: 10 Spell DC: B: 18; S: 18
Spells:
Acid Splash (S0 Conj): R60' Inflicts 4d6 HP acid (save Dexterity negates) on a single target or 2 adjacent targets
Cloud Of Daggers (S2 Conj): R60' 5' cube inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Color Spray (S1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Cone Of Cold (S5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (S4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Crown Of Madness (S2 Ench): R120' Self can direct the target's attacks each rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Disguise Self (B1 Illu): Changes the appearance of self body and clothing for 1 hr; physical investigation detects the illusion
Disintegrate (S6 Tran): R60' Inflicts 10d6+40 HP force and turns the target to dust if reduced to 0 HP (save Dexterity negates), or disintegrates a Large or smaller object or magical force [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Dominate Beast (S4 Ench): R60' Target beast obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 5, 6, or 7]
Fear (S3 Illu): Creatures in a 30' cone flee (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Feather Fall (S1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60' per rd for 1 min
Fireball (S3 Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half), obscures, and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Lightning Bolt (S3 Evoc): 100'x5' line inflicts 8d6 HP lightning (save Dexterity half) and ignites unattended flammable objects [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr; the spell ends if the target dons armor
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Mending (S0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target can hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Meteor Swarm (S9 Evoc): R1 mile 4 40' radius areas each inflict 20d6 HP fire and 20d6 HP bludgeoning (save Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Minor Illusion (S0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes a 40' cube of earth each 10 minutes for concentration up to 2 hr
Poison Spray (S0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Polymorph (S4 Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Ray Of Sickness (S1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Reverse Gravity (S7 Tran): R100' Items in a 50' radius fall upward for concentration up to 1 min
Seeming (S5 Illu): R30' Changes the appearance of targets (save Charisma negates; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shatter (S2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (save Constitution half; inorganic creatures have disadvantage) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Telekinesis (S5 Tran): R60' Self can mentally move a 1000 lb object 30' per rd (save Strength negates) for concentration up to 10 min
Teleport (S7 Conj): R10' Teleports an unattended object or self and 8 allies any distance; greater familiarity with the destination improves accuracy
True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Witch Bolt (S1 Evoc): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 1d12 HP lightning per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d12 HP initial]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 bard cantrips and can cast a chosen B1 spell once per long rest
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Arcane Exemplar Form: May discharge 6 runes to gain 40' fly speed, +2 spell DC, resistance to spell damage, and regaining HP from casting for 3+ rd 1/long rest
Careful Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to give 4 creatures a successful save on a self spell
Essence Runes: Spending Sorcery Points charges an equal number of runes (maximum 20); 5 charged runes emit a bright light in a 5' radius
Font Of Magic: Can use 20 Sorcery Points per long rest and can use a bonus action to convert between Sorcery Points and spell slots
Glyphs Of Aegis: May use Reaction to discharge runes, negating 1d6 damage each; touch may transfer the protection of 1 rune for 1 hr
Manifest Inscriptions: R15' May discharge 1 rune to reveal hidden glyphs for 1 rd
Quickened Spell: Can spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast a 1-action spell as bonus action
Runic Torrent: May discharge spell level runes to overcome target resistance and immunity
Sigilic Augmentation: May use a bonus action to discharge 1 rune, gaining Adv on Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution checks for 1 rd
Sorcerous Restoration: Taking a short rest restores 4 Sorcery Points
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the sorcerer spell list
Subtle Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell without somatic or verbal components
Twinned Spell: Can spend Sorcery Points equal to the level of a spell to add a second target
